___important_board_members.description: The number of board members that will have photos displayed for them.

___foi_exempt.description: Whether the organisation is exempt from Freedom of Information requests.

___acronym.description: The organisation's acronym, if it has one.

___ordered_featured_documents.description: A set of featured documents to display for the organisation. Turn into proper links once organisations are fully migrated.

$eref.description: When this content was last scheduled for publishing. Determined by the publishing intent sent by the publishing API.
The application that renders this item.
A path only. Query string and/or fragment are not allowed.
A unique identifier used to track publishing requests to rendered content
The delay between the most recent scheduled and actual publishing times. Determined by the content store based on the publishing intent.
A short identifier we send to Google Analytics for multi-valued fields. This means we avoid the truncated values we would get if we sent the path or slug of eg organisations.
